name: Ayngaran's Quest - Return to Nadesan's mine
name_original: Ayngaran's Quest - Return to Nadesan's mine
description:
This is a little game I've been working for the past month on free evenings.

In this dungeon crawler, you'll impersonate Ayngaran, a boye who likes to crawl!
You have a very weak sword and a bunch of spells you can use for mana.

THIS IS IN EARLY ACCESS: the art sucks, it's temporary and will be replaced with good pixel art as soon as I have everything on the coding side ready.
